name: L'Onza the Bounty Hunter
description:
L'Onza Chaku-Kwali has set out to defeat the dreaded Battle Station Otoyama, but must fight thousands of ships to get there. Help the infamous bounty hunter battle through it all and end the reign of terror.

For fans of shmups, fast-paced 2D action, bullet hells and twin-stick combat.

INCLUDES:

60 levels and 7 boss fights

3 gameplay styles: top-down, side-scrolling, arena (20 levels each)

endless arcade mode

challenge mode featuring 'boss rush'

slo-mo ability for dodging tough bullet patterns
